quoteLast: , June 16; and this witness observes (in a letter to the Bishop of Oxford, June 18) that "the last four-and-twenty hours preceding which [_i. e._ his death] were divided between short broken slumbers, and intervals of a calm but disordered talk when awake.

quoteTime: About eleven o'clock in the morn
quoteLast: ing the fog lifted, and to their intense surprise the crew of the "Queen of France" found themselves close alongside of a large merchant-ship.
